thread.title: The 2017 CFDA Awards Honors Raf Simons, Virgil Abloh & Rick Owens
thread.title_full: The 2017 CFDA Awards Honors Raf Simons, Virgil Abloh & Rick Owens

author: Kam Dhillon
title: The 2017 CFDA Awards Honors Raf Simons, Virgil Abloh & Rick Owens

persons.name: sies marjan kenneth cole rick owens pat mcgrath demna gvasalia
calvin klein robert geller thom browne tim coppens todd snyder stuart vevers
calvin klein marc jacobs jack mccollough

organizations.name: council of fashion designers of america

text:
The Council of Fashion Designers of America (better known as the CFDA) has just announced the nominees for its annual awards ceremony, set to take place in June. The CFDA Awards are basically the fashion industry’s Oscars and they honor the best and brightest in American and international fashion, including designers spanning womenswear, menswear, and accessories.
More recently, the CFDA has begun to recognize creativity beyond fashion design too, celebrating those who have excelled in journalism, creative vision, and obviously, personal style.
See the list of this year’s nominees below. Unsurprisingly, Raf Simons gets a warm welcome to New York with two nominations, Virgil Abloh gets a nod for his acclaimed OFF-WHITE label, Rick Owens is set to be honored with a lifetime achievement award, and Demna Gvasalia receives the international award.
Joseph Altuzarra, Altuzarra
Raf Simons, Calvin Klein
Marc Jacobs
Jack McCollough and Lazaro Hernandez, Proenza Schouler
Ashley and Mary-Kate Olsen, The Row
Raf Simons, Calvin Klein

Pat McGrath
Demna Gvasalia, Vetements and Balenciaga
Cecile Richards, Gloria Steinem, and Janelle Monáe
